languages.text: {n}Темная фигура Ульфара возвышается над вами. Его голова тяжело опущена, свисающие волосы скрывают лицо. Светлую кожу пересекают широкие алые рубцы, скрепленные металлическими скобами, поверх них черной краской написаны угловатые руны заговоров на исцеление телесное. Мог ли обычный смертный выжить с такими ранами? Маловероятно.{/n}

{n}Ulfar's dark figure towers over you. His head is lowered, his hair hanging in a curtain across his face. His fair skin is crosshatched with broad, crimson scars held together by metal staples and covered with black, spiked runes for physical healing. Could an ordinary mortal have survived such injuries? Unlikely.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Темная фигура Ульфара возвышается над вами. Его голова тяжело опущена, свисающие волосы скрывают лицо. Мог ли обычный смертный выжить с такими ранами? Маловероятно.{/n}

languages.text: {n}乌尔法阴沉的身躯矗立在你面前。他垂着头，红发挂在脸上，淡色的皮肤上到处都是撕开的深红色伤口。这些伤口目前用金属钉固定在了一起，钉子上刻满了黑色的尖锐符文，用来帮助身体愈合。若是换成普通的凡人，能从这样的重伤中恢复过来吗？恐怕不太可能。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's dark figure towers over you. His head is lowered, his hair hanging in a curtain across his face. His fair skin is crosshatched with broad, crimson scars held together by metal staples and covered with black, spiked runes for physical healing. Could an ordinary mortal have survived such injuries? Unlikely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法阴沉的身躯矗立在你面前。他垂着头，红发挂在脸上，淡色的皮肤上到处都是撕开的深红色伤口。这些伤口目前用金属钉固定在了一起，钉子上刻满了黑色的尖锐符文，用来帮助身体愈合。若是换成普通的凡人，能从这样的重伤中恢复过来吗？恐怕不太可能。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}ウルファーの黒い影が上にそびえている。彼が頭を下げると、顔をよぎるカーテンに髪がひっかかる。色白の肌には広範囲にわたって真っ赤な傷が格子状についている。傷は金属ステープルで縫合され、黒くとがった肉体治癒のルーンで覆われている。これほどの怪我から普通の人間が生還できるだろうか。まずあり得ない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's dark figure towers over you. His head is lowered, his hair hanging in a curtain across his face. His fair skin is crosshatched with broad, crimson scars held together by metal staples and covered with black, spiked runes for physical healing. Could an ordinary mortal have survived such injuries? Unlikely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーの黒い影が上にそびえている。彼が頭を下げると、顔をよぎるカーテンに髪がひっかかる。色白の肌には広範囲にわたって真っ赤な傷が格子状についている。傷は金属ステープルで縫合され、黒くとがった肉体治癒のルーンで覆われている。これほどの怪我から普通の人間が生還できるだろうか。まずあり得ない。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}La oscura figura de Ulfar se yergue ante ti. Su melena forma una cortina que tapa su cara. Su piel está cubierta de grandes cicatrices carmesíes, sujetas solo por grapas de metal y cubiertas de runas negras y espinosas que fomentan la curación. ¿Podría un mortal común sobrevivir a semejantes heridas? Es más que dudoso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's dark figure towers over you. His head is lowered, his hair hanging in a curtain across his face. His fair skin is crosshatched with broad, crimson scars held together by metal staples and covered with black, spiked runes for physical healing. Could an ordinary mortal have survived such injuries? Unlikely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La oscura figura de Ulfar se yergue ante ti. Su melena forma una cortina que tapa su cara. Su piel está cubierta de grandes cicatrices carmesíes, sujetas solo por grapas de metal y cubiertas de runas negras y espinosas que fomentan la curación. ¿Podría un mortal común sobrevivir a semejantes heridas? Es más que dudoso.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}La sombre silhouette d'Ulfar vous domine de toute sa hauteur. Sa tête est penchée et ses cheveux pendent comme un rideau sur son visage. Sa peau pâle est zébrée de larges cicatrices rouges maintenues par des agrafes métalliques et couvertes de runes noires de guérison. Un mortel ordinaire aurait-il pu survivre à de telles blessures ? Vous en doutez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's dark figure towers over you. His head is lowered, his hair hanging in a curtain across his face. His fair skin is crosshatched with broad, crimson scars held together by metal staples and covered with black, spiked runes for physical healing. Could an ordinary mortal have survived such injuries? Unlikely.{/n}

Sa peau pâle est zébrée de larges cicatrices rouges maintenues par des agrafes métalliques et couvertes de runes noires de guérison. Un mortel ordinaire aurait-il pu survivre à de telles blessures ? Vous en doutez.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ulfars dunkle Gestalt ragt über dir auf. Er hält den Kopf gesenkt, seine Haare hängen wie ein Vorhang vor seinem Gesicht. Seine helle Haut ist bedeckt mit breiten, roten Narben, die von Metallklammern zusammengehalten werden, und darauf befinden sich schwarze, gezackte Runen zur Wundheilung. Kann ein gewöhnlicher Sterblicher derartige Verletzungen überleben? Wohl kaum.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's dark figure towers over you. His head is lowered, his hair hanging in a curtain across his face. His fair skin is crosshatched with broad, crimson scars held together by metal staples and covered with black, spiked runes for physical healing. Could an ordinary mortal have survived such injuries? Unlikely.{/n}

Seine helle Haut ist bedeckt mit breiten, roten Narben, die von Metallklammern zusammengehalten werden, und darauf befinden sich schwarze, gezackte Runen zur Wundheilung. Kann ein gewöhnlicher Sterblicher derartige Verletzungen überleben? Wohl kaum.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}Ulfar'ın karanlık silüeti, önünde beliriyor. Başı eğik, saçları yüzünü bir perde gibi kapatmış. Soluk derisi; metal zımbalarla tutturulmuş, üzerine siyah renkli, şifa rünlerinin yerleştirildiği geniş, kırmızı yaralarla kaplı. Böyle yaraları olan, sıradan bir fâni iyileşebilir miydi? Çok zor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's dark figure towers over you. His head is lowered, his hair hanging in a curtain across his face. His fair skin is crosshatched with broad, crimson scars held together by metal staples and covered with black, spiked runes for physical healing. Could an ordinary mortal have survived such injuries? Unlikely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar'ın karanlık silüeti önünde beliriyor. Başı eğilmiş, saçları yüzünü bir perde gibi kapatmış. Soluk derisi metal zımbalarla tutturulmuş geniş ve kırmızı yaralarla dolu, fiziksel şifa için siyah ve dikenli rünlerle kaplanmış. Sıradan bir fâni bu yaralarla hayatta kalabilir miydi? Düşük bir ihtimal.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked
